channel.title: Npc speaking

item.title: Npc speaking
item.dc:creator: @newb_pk3r newb pk3r
item.description:
@newb_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:4, topic:280678”]You would add it inside the switch statement for NPC talking, which is under "NPCCHAT’, in your client class.

If you don’t have deltascape, or a deltascape-based server it will not work, unless you declare the methods needed.[/quote]

i have deltascape i don’t completely understand what you mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc speaking
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You would add it inside the switch statement for NPC talking, which is under "NPCCHAT’, in your client class.

If you don’t have deltascape, or a deltascape-based server it will not work, unless you declare the methods needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc speaking
item.dc:creator: @newb_pk3r newb pk3r
item.description:
@newb_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:2, topic:280678”]If you’re, for example using a Deltascape base, which has a 2 line feature on it’s dialog, it would be like so;

case ####: talk2("Hello there, how's it going then?", "Jolly good day it is!"); break;[/quote]

how do i set a case?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc speaking
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you’re, for example using a Deltascape base, which has a 2 line feature on it’s dialog, it would be like so;

case ####: talk2("Hello there, how's it going then?", "Jolly good day it is!"); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Npc speaking
item.dc:creator: @newb_pk3r newb pk3r
item.description:
@newb_pk3r wrote:

How do i make an npc speak more then one time?

i put

sendFrame126("Hahhaaa? Talking to me? You must be kidding?", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame126("Other, if you think you can, why not try noob :)", 4887); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4888); }

and when i speak to the npc, it only puts "“Hahhaaa? Talking to me? You must be kidding”

how do i make it say
“Hahhaaa? Talking to me? You must be kidding”
then
“other if you think you can, why not try noob ;)”

Read full topic
